channel.title: Backpacking on Lovetoautomate.it - Sander de Groot - Nomadic Software Engineer
channel.description: Recent content in Backpacking on Lovetoautomate.it - Sander de Groot - Nomadic Software Engineer

item.title: Christchurch, on the other side of the world
item.description: At last, I have arrived in the country I really wanted to go to: New Zealand. Without a plan or even the slightest idea on how to travel through New Zealand, I took the plane from the metropool Singapore to the country of backpackers!

item.title: Singapore: the city of diversity
item.description:
On March 5, 2018, my journey finally started. The first stop you ask? Singapore! Spending a little over 6 days in this city-state, allowed me to see quite a bit of what this city has to offer. My verdict? Must visit!

Want to see more? Follow me on Polarsteps. It’s a really cool app, definitely worth taking a look if you are travelling yourself.
